principle_scores.name: Dark/Black Slimming
principle_scores.reasoning: color_lightness: 0.9 >>  | Light color (L=0.90): slight expansion penalty = -0.04
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating Dark/Black Slimming: how this garment's color creates visual slimming or expansion effects for your body
Con: This garment has a light color which can visually expand the areas it covers, making them appear slightly larger, -0.04

principle_scores.name: A-Line Balance
principle_scores.reasoning: expansion_rate: 0.05 >>  | ER=0.05: base A-line = +0.20 base: 0.2 >>  | drape_coefficient: 70 >>  | DC=70% (stiff): shelf effect INVERSION | body_shape: apple; is_tall: false; is_petite: false; body_shape: apple >>  | APPLE: (+0.03) | is_plus_size: true; drapeMult: -0.5 >>  | Plus + stiff A-line: shelf amplified | body_shape: apple; hem_position: mini >>
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating A-Line Balance: how this garment's A-line silhouette creates balance and flatters your figure
Pro: This garment has a subtle A-line flare that creates gentle shape without overwhelming, +0.20
Con: This garment has a stiff fabric that creates a 'shelf effect' at the hips rather than flowing smoothly over them
Pro: For your apple body shape with this garment, the A-line silhouette flows away from your midsection to create a smooth line, +0.03
Con: For plus-size frames with this stiff A-line garment, the fabric creates a more pronounced shelf effect at the hips rather than flowing smoothly

principle_scores.name: Tent Concealment
principle_scores.reasoning: expansion_rate: 0.05 >>  | body_shape: apple; is_plus_size: true; is_structured: true >>  | ER=0.05: semi-fitted optimal | Plus + structured semi-fitted: smooth containment
prompt_input_reasoning: Evaluating Tent Concealment: how this garment's loose silhouette balances coverage with how it affects perceived size
Pro: This garment has a semi-fitted silhouette that skims your body without being too tight or too loose — an ideal balance, +0.15
Pro: For plus-size frames with this structured semi-fitted garment, the combination smooths your silhouette while providing comfortable coverage, +0.20

principle_scores.name: Fabric Zone

Pro: This garment has a structured fabric that provides support and creates a polished silhouette, +0.15
Con: This garment has a stiff fabric that holds its own shape rather than following your body's contours, -0.10
